description: This file defines a thread-safe message queue class 'Queue' supporting one-way messaging and request-response patterns, used for inter-thread or inter-process communication within the 'PolyM' namespace.

classes.name: Queue
classes.description: A thread-safe message queue supporting put, get, tryGet, request, and respondTo operations.

methods.name: put
methods.description: Insert a message at the end of the queue.

methods.name: get
methods.description: Retrieve a message from the head of the queue, blocking until a message is available or timeout occurs.

methods.name: tryGet
methods.description: Attempt to retrieve a message without blocking; returns null if none available.

methods.name: request
methods.description: Send a request message and block until a response is received or timeout occurs.

methods.name: respondTo
methods.description: Send a response to a previously received request identified by its UID.
